actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A resolution urging the Food and Drug Administration to review and revise the approval process for experimental drugs.

summary.text: Declares that it is the sense of the Senate that: (1) the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) is to be commended for its proposed changes to the drug approval process; and (2) the FDA should review the approval process, incorporate ways for more timely, yet safe approval, and for access by all terminally ill patients to experimental drugs awaiting approval.

titles.title: A resolution urging the Food and Drug Administration to review and revise the approval process for experimental drugs.
